setting Package¶

settingModel Module¶

fla.gr request model for managing site wide settings
This is more just so each module in the admin panel can have a standard way of setting and retrieving settings

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

models.setting.settingModel.getSetting(featureName, settingName)¶
models.setting.settingModel.setSetting(featureName, settingName, value)¶

This may or may not work the way I’m hoping for it to... Should update the given buckets settings to value

Parameters:
  • bucketName – The bucket name to update the settings for
  • settingName – The name of the settings, if this key exists then a type check will happen against value
  • value – The value of the setting, should match type of setting if settingName exists in the db already
